thread.section_title: Yahoo! Finance: Property Management Industry News
thread.title: Simon Property Raises Guidance

title: Simon Property Raises Guidance
text:
Mall occupancy and square foot rent both rise in June quarter By Angela Chen July 24, 2015 7:48 a.m. ET 
Simon Property Group Inc. raised its guidance as higher prices led to better-than-expected earnings in the June quarter. 
For the year, Simon expects now per-share earnings between $5.47 and $5.52 a share, up from its previous range of $5.10 to $5.20. It expects funds from operations between $10.02 to $10.07 a share, up from its range of $9.65... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
